author: Ashleigh Fields
description: The Trump administration will appeal a federal judge’s ruling that declared the rescission of $2.6 billion in federal funds from Harvard University was unconstitutional. U.S. District Judge Allison Burroughs issued a September ruling describing the White House crack down on the Ivy League institution as “a smokescreen for a targeted, ideologically-motivated assault on this country’s…
title: Trump administration appealing Harvard funding ruling

author: The Hill Staff
description: President Trump on Friday afternoon will make an announcement related to lowering drug prices — an effort he has leaned into ahead of the 2026 midterm elections. In recent months, Trump has struck deals with several drug manufacturers — including Pfizer, Novo Nordisk, Eli Lilly and AstraZeneca — as part of his most favored nation…
title: Watch live: Trump to deliver announcement on drug pricing

author: Ashleigh Fields
description: Claudio Neves Valente, 48, the suspected gunman in the recent Brown University and MIT shootings, was found dead in a New Hampshire storage facility on Thursday night. Authorities told reporters that Neves Valente died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound. The incident at Brown University on Saturday left two students dead and several others injured. He…
title: Who is Claudio Neves Valente, Brown University shooting suspect found dead

author: Joseph Choi
description: The Trump administration is planning to announce an overhaul to the childhood immunization schedule early next year, recommending fewer shots and aligning U.S. policy with that of Denmark. A source familiar with the matter told NewsNation correspondent Libbey Dean that a new vaccination schedule to be released next year would recommend fewer shots, “aligning more with…
title: HHS to announce overhaul to child vaccine schedule, aligning with Denmark

author: Julia Mueller
description: Sen. Richard Blumenthal (D-Conn.) on Friday said while he’d like to see the Democratic National Committee’s (DNC) analysis of 2024 losses, the focus of the party should be forward-looking.  “I‘m always in favor of transparency … and greater knowledge about mistakes that may have been made,” Blumenthal told CNN. “Frankly, my focus is on the future.”…
title: Blumenthal on withheld DNC 2024 autopsy report: ‘My focus is on the future’

author: Andrew Latham, opinion contributor
description: It is a blunt admission that Canada has run out of room to hide a systemic failure that has long undermined both its national defense and its value as an ally.
title: Canada’s new defense agency helps Ottawa get out its own way

author: Ashleigh Fields
description: TikTok on Thursday signed a deal to sell U.S. assets to three U.S. investors: Oracle, Silver Lake and MGX. Nearly 50 percent of the assets — or 15 percent each — will be held by the three American companies. The rest will remain in the hands of affiliates of existing investors of TikTok’s parent company,…
title: TikTok signs deal to sell US assets to American investors

author: Will Marshall, opinion contributor
description: It’s an intellectual, political and moral failure of the first order — and they should pay dearly for it in next year’s midterm elections.
title: Republicans are still clueless on health care

author: Myra Adams, opinion contributor
description: Let’s examine four of those “dangerous trends” our founders would not have celebrated.
title: What the Founders would not celebrate at America’s 250th birthday

author: Jared Gans
description: Plus: Brown, MIT shooting suspect found dead; Trump move blows up funding deal; DNC keeps 2024 postmortem private.
title: Trump administration set for long-awaited Epstein files release

author: Filip Timotija
description: The U.S. military struck two alleged drug-trafficking boats in the eastern Pacific on Thursday, killing five “narco-terrorists” and bringing the total number of people killed in the Pentagon’s ongoing campaign to over 100.  Three people were killed on the first boat and two people were killed in the strike on the second vessel, the U.S.…
title: US military kills 5 ‘narco-terrorists’ in eastern Pacific, surpassing 100 deaths in boat strikes
